hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\blueE9$ tens and $\blueE2$ ones. 

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/576042e93e450651e5e865d26d5e3e9d89e7c47b)

There are $\blueE{92}$ blocks.

The second set of blocks shows $\maroonD5$ tens and $\maroonD{6}$ ones. 

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/f50751d5a913ebf5a88f550c761a359bc7911f08)

So, we are subtracting $\maroonD{56}$ blocks.

When we subtract $\blueE{92}-\maroonD{56}$, the difference is $\blueE{36}$ blocks.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/a4913d20203feeb20391cfb2955b11bc6e7cce25)

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$92- 56 = 36$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented from the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/1119c63625d3689c4c0cd957941118914849bd96)

[[☃ radio 1]]
